name: ButtonStyleButton
desc: The base [StatefulWidget] class for buttons whose style is defined by a [ButtonStyle] object.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: Called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: onLongPress
fields.desc: Called when the button is long-pressed.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer enters or exits the button response area.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: isSemanticButton
fields.desc: Determine whether this subtree represents a button.

fields.name: tooltip
fields.desc: Text that describes the action that will occur when the button is pressed or hovered over.
